updateInfo.title: The Latest and Greatest
updateInfo.desc: From now on, when a new version of Caravan is released, you'll see this update summary. Neato!

updateInfo.title: Revamped Notifications
updateInfo.desc: Hover over notifications to show all future notifications, including in compact mode.

updateInfo.title: Got Networking?
updateInfo.desc: Have slow internet, or want to save internet bandwidth? Try enabling Low Bandwidth Mode in Caravan account settings.

updateInfo.title: Cracking Modules
updateInfo.desc: You can now view your course modules. Try navigating to the modules page on the course home page. (limit most recent 10 modules and module items per module)

updateInfo.title: Features on the Side
features: Dashboard and course show locked assignments.
Smarter caching to save network bandwidth.
